TitleEnglish: When Will Ayumu Make His Move?
SummaryEnglish: Ayumu Tanaka, a first-year high school student, and Urushi Yaotome, a second-year student, are members of the shogi club. Ayumu vows to confess his feelings to Urushi, his senpai, after he manages to defeat her in a game of shogi, but he is a beginner at the game and Urushi always beats him. Meanwhile, Urushi keeps trying to get Ayumu to admit that he likes her, but Ayumu never allows his poker face to slip.

1.SummaryEnglish: Ayumu has an uphill battle ahead of him if he insists on beating Urushi in a shogi match before confessing to her. Especially since she already has her suspicions.

2.TitleEnglish: I Want to Make You Happy, Senpai
2.SummaryEnglish: Urushi needs more members to officialize the shogi club. But she’ll have to survive Sport’s Day first!

3.TitleEnglish: I Want to Go on a First Date, Senpai
3.SummaryEnglish: Ayumu and Urushi are going to the school festival together. But it’s not a date—they’re just, uh, trying to recruit more members for their club! Yeah, that’s it!

4.TitleEnglish: I Want to Spend Time Together, Senpai
4.SummaryEnglish: It’s the end of the year, and that means Christmas is coming. If Ayumu makes the right moves, he and Urushi could actually make some progress.

5.TitleEnglish: I Want to Know More, Senpai
5.SummaryEnglish: A new year marks a new beginning and Urushi coincidentally runs into Ayumu when she’s out and about!

6.TitleEnglish: I Want to Get It From You, Senpai
6.SummaryEnglish: Valentine’s Day is here and that can only mean two things: chocolates and anxiety.

8.TitleEnglish: It's a Role I Refuse to Relinquish, Senpai
8.SummaryEnglish: The shogi club is now official, but Urushi realizes she must earn Rin’s respect. Meanwhile, Rin wants to know exactly what’s going on between Ayumu and Urushi.

9.TitleEnglish: I Want to Make Memories, Senpai
9.SummaryEnglish: Golden Week is here, and that means the shogi club can relax and have fun!

10.SummaryEnglish: Tension is in the air when Ayumu meets Urushi’s father.

11.TitleEnglish: I Want to Get Stronger, Senpai
11.SummaryEnglish: Urushi’s thoughts drift towards a certain someone while she’s on a school trip. Meanwhile, Ayumu and Rin bond while practicing shogi.

12.TitleEnglish: I Want to Win and Tell You How I Feel, Senpai
12.SummaryEnglish: Ayumu is determined to win a shogi match once Urushi returns from the school trip. But then Rin asks him an important question.
